segments.text: Ugh, that overflowing sink is disgusting; water just cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinet doors and pooling on the floor like filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't flinch—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling a wet plate with that towel, probably spreading moisture everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good, fingers in the cookie jar amid this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability on the wet floor? That's a slippery nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand reaching near it all just adds to the ick factor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in a kitchen turning into a swamp; how unappetizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden looks clean, a stark contrast to this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wrinkle my nose at the whole soggy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's getting ruined by that careless faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
